conclusion: Analyze the motion of the blue sphere (A) as it falls freely from above, and determine its trajectory and collision with the surrounding blocks.

Since the sphere is falling freely, the force of gravity will pull it downward.
As the sphere falls, it will accelerate downward due to gravity. The trajectory will be a straight line downward.
